Advanced Ice Shielding.name: Advanced Ice Shielding
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Ice Barrier, Ice Block and Ice Mirror spells by 25%, reduces their Mana cost by 10% and reduces the chance your Ice Barrier will be dispelled by 50%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Ice Barrier, Ice Block and Ice Mirror spells by 50%, reduces their Mana cost by 20% and reduces the chance your Ice Barrier will be dispelled by 100%.

Ice Barrier.name: Ice Barrier
descriptions: Instantly shields a friendly target, absorbing 548 damage.  Lasts dIndex=3.  While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.

Winter's Chill.name: Winter's Chill
descriptions: Gives your Frost damage spells a 20% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by $12579s1% for $12579d.  Stacks up to $12579u times.

Gives your Frost damage spells a 40% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by $12579s1% for $12579d.  Stacks up to $12579u times.

Gives your Frost damage spells a 60% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by $12579s1% for $12579d.  Stacks up to $12579u times.

Gives your Frost damage spells a 80% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by $12579s1% for $12579d.  Stacks up to $12579u times.

Gives your Frost damage spells a 100% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by $12579s1% for $12579d.  Stacks up to $12579u times.

Lord of the North Wind.name: Lord of the North Wind
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 2% and the chance you are hit by melee and ranged attacks reduced by 1%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 4% and the chance you are hit by melee and ranged attacks reduced by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 6% and the chance you are hit by melee and ranged attacks reduced by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 8% and the chance you are hit by melee and ranged attacks reduced by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 10% and the chance you are hit by melee and ranged attacks reduced by 5%.

Icing.name: Icing
descriptions: Regenerates $34266s1% of your health and mana every $34266t sec if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Regenerates $34266s1% of your health and mana every $34267t sec if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Regenerates $34266s1% of your health and mana every $34268t sec if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Regenerates $34266s1% of your health and mana every $34269t sec if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.
Regenerates $34266s1% of your health and mana every $34270t sec if you've been standing still for ~10 sec.

Ice Shards.name: Ice Shards
descriptions: Launches four shards of ice at the enemy, each dealing Frost damage equal to your level and slowing movement speed by $35716s1% for $35716d.

Ice Mirror.name: Ice Mirror
descriptions: Protects the friendly target with a mirror of ice. The mirror reflects spells casts for dIndex=7.

Cold Blood.name: Cold Blood
descriptions: Increases your chance to resist Silence and Interrupt effects by an additional 10%.
Increases your chance to resist Silence and Interrupt effects by an additional 20%.
Increases your chance to resist Silence and Interrupt effects by an additional 30%.

Shatter.name: Shatter
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 10%.
Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 20%.
Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 30%.

Frost Shards.name: Frost Shards
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 40%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 60%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 80%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 100%.

Cold Grip.name: Cold Grip
descriptions: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold and Ice Shards by 15% and reduces the cooldown of Cone of Cold and Cold Snap by 25%. In addition, your Blizzard spell chills targets, reducing their movement speed by $12484s1% for $12484d.

Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold and Ice Shards by 30% and reduces the cooldown of Cone of Cold and Cold Snap by 50%. In addition, your Blizzard spell chills targets, reducing their movement speed by $12485s1% for $12485d.

Arctic Reach.name: Arctic Reach
descriptions: Increases the range and the radius of your Frost spells by 10%.
Increases the range and the radius of your Frost spells by 20%.

Ice Block.name: Ice Block
descriptions: You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for dIndex=1, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells.

Frost Channeling.name: Frost Channeling
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 3% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 6%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 6% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 12%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 9% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 18%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 12% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 24%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 15% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 30%.

Improved Frost Nova.name: Improved Frost Nova
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by 10 sec.

Frostbite.name: Frostbite
descriptions: Gives your Chill effects a 5% chance to freeze the target for $12494d.
Gives your Chill effects a 10% chance to freeze the target for $12494d.
Gives your Chill effects a 15% chance to freeze the target for $12494d.

Cryo Core.name: Cryo Core
descriptions: Reduces all spell damage taken by 5%, but increases physical damage taken by 3%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 10%, but increases physical damage taken by 6%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 15%, but increases physical damage taken by 9%.

Permafrost.name: Permafrost
descriptions: Increases the duration of your Chill effects by 1 $lsec:secs; and reduces the target's speed by an additional 4%.
Increases the duration of your Chill effects by 2 $lsec:secs; and reduces the target's speed by an additional 7%.
Increases the duration of your Chill effects by 3 $lsec:secs; and reduces the target's speed by an additional 10%.

Improved Frostbolt.name: Improved Frostbolt
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.5 sec.

Frost Warding.name: Frost Warding
descriptions: Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 15%.  In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 15% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.
Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 30%.  In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 30% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.
